accessories.Name: Give a Gift Card: Any Size!
accessories.Body:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Yellow Leaf Hammocks Gift Card! You pick a size + they pick the color they love most!

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout.

Our gift cards have no additional processing fees and include free shipping for your recipient.

accessories.Name: "Go Anywhere" Hanging Straps
accessories.Body:
Hang your hammock anywhere with our versatile "Go Anywhere" Hammock Straps! These superstrong, tree-friendly straps make it possible to hang your hammock from trees or posts that are 9 feet to 30+ feet apart! (No knots required!)

Unlike a traditional rope, these wide webbed straps will not cut into & damage your trees.

Each package includes:

  • Two pre-looped 12’ straps
  • Two S-hook connectors
  • Custom navy canvas package for travel and storage
Product Description:
  • Extra long for maximum versatility
  • Superstrong (up to 400 lb capacity) 
  • 20 pre-loops for convenient set-up (no need for knots)
  • Double reinforced stitching by an expert seamstress
  • Dimensions: 12’x1” (each strap)
  • Weight: 7.2 oz (each strap)
  • Max. Capacity: 400 lbs (per set)

To Use:

Wrap a strap securely around each support point (thread the end of strap through the appropriate loop, depending on the length of strap you require) and connect the eyes of the hammock to the pre-made attachment points using the included S-hooks.

Each hammock comes with a Hammocking 101 guidebook and detailed hanging instructions.

Note: You do not need straps to connect your hammock to a hammock stand.

adventure-hammock.Name: The Adventure Hammock
adventure-hammock.Body:
This Adventure Hammock by Yellow Leaf is absurdly lightweight, easy-to-pack and ready to hang anywhere your travels take you.

=> Easy to hang anywhere!

=> Fits easily into your backpack or suitcase

=> Super-tough parachute fabric for strength

What Makes The ADVENTURE HAMMOCK So Awesome?

ABSURDLY LIGHTWEIGHT: Ultra-portable + ultra-light at just 11 oz 

ARTISAN MADE: Unparalleled craftsmanship and no generic factory production! Each hammock directly supports a sustainable job and a path out of poverty for women in rural Thailand. 

SOFT & SNUGGLY: Smooth, comfortable fabric won’t leave waffle-weave marks on your skin or give you a rope burn! Uncoated taffeta material is breathable and soft on your skin. 

SUPER STRENGTH: Parachute nylon fabric is abrasion resistant and easily holds up to 400 lbs 

SLEEK DESIGN: We’ve shed all the extra weight to present a streamlined, slick hammock with style to spare. 

Included: 

ESCAPE POUCH: Always ready for adventure! The Escape Pouch makes it easy to pack up the Adventure Hammock for any excursion or voyage. The included Escape Pouch is about the size of a grapefruit and it’s sewn directly to the side of the hammock, so you’ll never have to stress about losing it. And when you’re hanging, it doubles as a gear pouch for essentials, like a cold water bottle or a good book. 

HEAVY-DUTY S-HOOKS: Zinc-plated to resist rust, our high-quality S-hooks won’t snag your hammock or wear down in the elements. 

Product Specifications:

  • Color(s): Dark Green and Deep Blue
  • Capacity: 350 lbs
  • Dimensions: Unfolded: 8.2' L x 5' W; In Pouch: 6" x 6"
  • Product Weight: 11 oz.
  • Material: Hammock made from 70D high tenacity nylon taffeta, hooks made from zinc-plated steel

hammock-offers.Collection: ALL HAMMOCK SKUS (NO GIFT CARD/DESIGN YOUR OWN)
hammock-offers.Name: 'Merica Hammock
hammock-offers.Body:
Color(s):    Cobalt Blue, White, Candy Apple Red 
Capacity:   Classic Double: 400 lbs  //  King-Size: 550 lbs
Dimensions:    Classic Double:10'L x 6'W  //  King-Size: 11'L x 9'W  

Product Weight:    Classic Double: 1.7 lbs  //  King-Size: 2.3 lbs

Details:
  • Proprietary weaves are technically engineered for extreme comfort
  • Free-flowing weaves contour perfectly to your body for weightless napping
  • Breezy, loose-knit design keeps you cool on hot days
  • Super-soft yarn feels great on skin and prevents the dreaded “waffle-imprint”
  • Anti-flip designs mean you can nap without worrying about spilling out
  • Weathersafe + colorfast yarn for durable and lasting outdoor performance
        (“lazy-proof” hammocks can be left out all season)
  • Meticulously 100% handwoven (it takes 6-7 days to create each signature hammock)
  • Roomy hammocks expand to share without squishing
  • Does not include Hanging Hardware, Hammock Straps or Stand

    •   Included:
  • Comes packaged in a Signature “Hammock Tote” - perfect for easy storage + travel
  • Includes a "Hammocking 101" Hanging Guide for easy setup

    •  

    National Hammock Day:

    This is the Un-Official Hammock of "National Hammock Day" on July 22!

custom-hammock-design.Name: Design a Chair Hammock
custom-hammock-design.Body:
By popular demand, the option to Design Your Own Hammock has finally arrived. When you design a custom Yellow Leaf Hammock, you can:

  • show your team spirit
  • surprise a birthday boy or girl with their favorite colors
  • match your seasonal outdoor decor
  • coordinate with your bedroom, dorm room or greek house
  • add the perfect pop of color to your living room or home office
  • create any color combination that suits your hammocking dreams

When you purchase a custom hammock, you will receive a hammock design guide and concierge support service from our hammock design team! 

Please note that custom hammocks are handwoven to order. Allow 4-6 weeks for delivery.

gift-hammocks.Name: Give a Gift Card: Any Size!
gift-hammocks.Body:

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout.

Our gift cards have no additional processing fees and include free shipping for your recipient.

hammock-stand-ropes-accessories.Name: "Go Anywhere" Hanging Straps
hammock-stand-ropes-accessories.Body:
Hang your hammock anywhere with our versatile "Go Anywhere" Hammock Straps! These superstrong, tree-friendly straps make it possible to hang your hammock from trees or posts that are 9 feet to 30+ feet apart! (No knots required!)

Unlike a traditional rope, these wide webbed straps will not cut into & damage your trees.

Each package includes:

  • Two pre-looped 12’ straps
  • Two S-hook connectors
  • Custom navy canvas package for travel and storage
Product Description:
  • Extra long for maximum versatility
  • Superstrong (up to 400 lb capacity) 
  • 20 pre-loops for convenient set-up (no need for knots)
  • Double reinforced stitching by an expert seamstress
  • Dimensions: 12’x1” (each strap)
  • Weight: 7.2 oz (each strap)
  • Max. Capacity: 400 lbs (per set)

To Use:

Wrap a strap securely around each support point (thread the end of strap through the appropriate loop, depending on the length of strap you require) and connect the eyes of the hammock to the pre-made attachment points using the included S-hooks.

Each hammock comes with a Hammocking 101 guidebook and detailed hanging instructions.

Note: You do not need straps to connect your hammock to a hammock stand.

hammock-stand-ropes-accessories.Name: Adjustable Hammock Stand (Charcoal)
hammock-stand-ropes-accessories.Body: A Hammock Stand to help you hang your hammock outdoors whether or not you have two perfect trees. This adjustable hammock stand is compatible with a Yellow Leaf Classic Double Hammock. Ships fast and free within the USA.

hammock-stand-ropes-accessories.Name: Adjustable Hammock Stand (Pure White)
hammock-stand-ropes-accessories.Body: A Hammock Stand to help you hang your hammock outdoors whether or not you have two perfect trees. This adjustable hammock stand is compatible with a Yellow Leaf Classic Double Hammock. Ships fast and free within the USA.

hanging-chair-hammock.Name: Design a Chair Hammock
hanging-chair-hammock.Body:
By popular demand, the option to Design Your Own Hammock has finally arrived. When you design a custom Yellow Leaf Hammock, you can:

  • show your team spirit
  • surprise a birthday boy or girl with their favorite colors
  • match your seasonal outdoor decor
  • coordinate with your bedroom, dorm room or greek house
  • add the perfect pop of color to your living room or home office
  • create any color combination that suits your hammocking dreams

When you purchase a custom hammock, you will receive a hammock design guide and concierge support service from our hammock design team! 

Please note that custom hammocks are handwoven to order. Allow 4-6 weeks for delivery.

classic-double-hammock.Name: Design a Signature Hammock
classic-double-hammock.Body:
By popular demand, the option to Design Your Own Hammock has finally arrived. When you design a custom Yellow Leaf Hammock, you can:

  • show your team spirit
  • surprise a birthday boy or girl with their favorite colors
  • match your seasonal outdoor decor
  • coordinate with your bedroom, dorm room or greek house
  • add the perfect pop of color to your living room or home office
  • create any color combination that suits your hammocking dreams

When you purchase a custom hammock, you will receive a hammock design guide and concierge support service from our hammock design team! 

Please note that custom hammocks are handwoven to order. Allow. 4-6 weeks for delivery.

stands.Name: Adjustable Hammock Stand (Charcoal)
stands.Body: A Hammock Stand to help you hang your hammock outdoors whether or not you have two perfect trees. This adjustable hammock stand is compatible with a Yellow Leaf Classic Double Hammock. Ships fast and free within the USA.

stands.Name: Adjustable Hammock Stand (Pure White)
stands.Body: A Hammock Stand to help you hang your hammock outdoors whether or not you have two perfect trees. This adjustable hammock stand is compatible with a Yellow Leaf Classic Double Hammock. Ships fast and free within the USA.

strap-exclusions.Name: "Go Anywhere" Hanging Straps
strap-exclusions.Body:
Hang your hammock anywhere with our versatile "Go Anywhere" Hammock Straps! These superstrong, tree-friendly straps make it possible to hang your hammock from trees or posts that are 9 feet to 30+ feet apart! (No knots required!)

Unlike a traditional rope, these wide webbed straps will not cut into & damage your trees.

Each package includes:

  • Two pre-looped 12’ straps
  • Two S-hook connectors
  • Custom navy canvas package for travel and storage
Product Description:
  • Extra long for maximum versatility
  • Superstrong (up to 400 lb capacity) 
  • 20 pre-loops for convenient set-up (no need for knots)
  • Double reinforced stitching by an expert seamstress
  • Dimensions: 12’x1” (each strap)
  • Weight: 7.2 oz (each strap)
  • Max. Capacity: 400 lbs (per set)

To Use:

Wrap a strap securely around each support point (thread the end of strap through the appropriate loop, depending on the length of strap you require) and connect the eyes of the hammock to the pre-made attachment points using the included S-hooks.

Each hammock comes with a Hammocking 101 guidebook and detailed hanging instructions.

Note: You do not need straps to connect your hammock to a hammock stand.
